name: Solitairey in School
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 41!

Theme: Combine Two Incompatible Genres

Card Games & Dating Sims 

You were a loner until your first day of high school, where you decide to use your deck-building skills to determine your social (and love) life! Challenge your card strategies as you try to tackle the social struggle of breaking out of your shell in a new school.

Your weapon of choice? A deck of cards.

Choose from 4 (or is it 5?) love interests!

In Development

Developed in Ren'Py.

Lily Peng: Programming & Story

Colm Eccles: Art
